"Cradle of Darkness":
"This is an emergency message for all ARKS.
We have tracked the mysterious ARKS'
signal to what we believe to be some kind
of Darker den.
All ARKS are to head to the target
coordinates and secure the den.
We expect to encounter a large number
of Darkers on-site. Proceed with caution.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Fail mission goals, time limit expires"
